name: Dungeon Gunner
description:
This game Contains 2 levels . In each level there are  random ten rooms you must reach final level exit room to enter into the next level , as you finish second level you have fight with EVEGALORE . if you are successfully able to beat him then you won the game

I Have made this game using assets of @gamesplusjames by  following his lectures. It took nearly 15-20 days to make this game. if you find any bugs please report it in comment section and i will update in later version.  To say this is my first game on itch.io . if you like this  game pls do fund me via PAYPAL
